update br_user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
select
from br_user where `create_user` = #{userId} and `username` like "%"#{name}"%" ORDER BY create_time desc limit ${pageStart},${pageSize};
select count(id) from `br_user` where `create_user` = #{userId} and `username` like "%"#{name}"%"
select count(id) from `br_user` where `create_user` = #{userId} and `username` like "%"#{name}"%" and `create_time` >= #{firstDay}
